name: Classic Road Bike
notes: Bought this on eBay in 2014 for $389. Was being sold at an estate sale, had been barely used and was just collecting dust in the garage. I use it for commuting around the city.

name: CX Bike
notes: Received this for building Andrew Low's lowbicycles.com website. It is by far my favorite bike. Many of my YouTube vids are recorded riding this; it's used mainly for more serious group rides.
